downloadTitle: SharePoint Foundation 2010 site and content security worksheet
downloadDescription: Use this worksheet to record inherited and unique permissions, and record which groups need what level of access.
detailsSection: For each securable object in the site hierarchy (for example: top-level Web site, subsite, list, folder, or item), you need to specify which groups need permissions and what permission level to assign to the group. Use this worksheet to record inherited and unique permissions, and record which groups need what level of access.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Office Excel 2007; Microsoft Office Excel 2010
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button above to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this file to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
